input.sentences: we prepared for the graduation ceremony to start .
many students gathered in the hall .
they walked on the road as one .
the valedictorian made a great speech towards the students .

output.sentences: The students were prepared to start graduation.
The students all gathered in the hall.
They walked on the road to their destination.
The students listened as the valedictorian gave her speech.
Lastly, the students threw their hats.
